name: ISLAND STORIES
short_description: Born the twenty first day of January 1977, Eamon Ireland grew up in the shadows of the Galtee Mountains (Sléibhte na gCoillte). The adjacent architecture of the Ballyhouras holding the resting place of legendary warrior Fionn Mac Cumhaill, father of Oisin. The prehistoric remnants of Lough Gur to add by chance and cast a crooked ray of inspiration. It would take several years and countless miles before his exploration of all of Ireland’s islands would result in this fascinating testament. Author of The Fairy’s Corner and Winner of the United Kingdom’s larg-est Songwriting Competition. All ten stories illustrated in this book were completed in their entirety in under two and a half hours on a bitterly cold night of 2010 at 3.45 am.
